wordpressPost.title: Nighttime Øya at The Crossroad Club
wordpressPost.content:
WEDNESDAY 8th of AUGUST

TY SEGALL (US)

Ty Segall describes his upcoming album as evil space rock, and hope that it may sound like Hawkwind meets the Stooges. This year is hectic for Segall, as he will do three releases (solo, with a touring band and one with White Fence).
Tickets NOK 150, – + fee with festival pass, NOK 200, – + fee without a festival pass
Pre-sale on Tiger, tigernet.no
ID: 20 years

THURSDAY 9th of AUGUST

JACUZZI BOYS (US)

Three dudes from Miami, play equal parts power pop, glam and old garage rock. Last year’s album Glazin ‘is perfect nostalgic pop.

Tickets NOK 120, – + fee with festival pass, NOK 160, – + fee without a festival pass
Pre-sale on Tiger, tigernet.no
ID: 20 years

SATURDAY 11th of AUGUST

FATBOY (SE)

The Swedish rockabilly gang Fatboy is back in Oslo. They mix rockabilly with jazz, country, blues… all this while Roy Orbison is watching from above.
Tickets NOK 120, – + fee with festival pass, NOK 165, – + fee without a festival pass
Pre-sale on Tiger, tigernet.no
ID: 20 years

 

 

ABOUT NIGHTTIME ØYA:
Nighttime Øya are concerts and club concepts around the city center after the Medieval Park closes at 23.00. This is an excellent opportunity to hang on to that great festival feeling and bring it along to the city. Nighttime Øya is arranged in cooperation with the best organizers and clubs in Oslo. Due to varying conditions and the need for organizers to get these gigs/ club concepts to go round, it is not possible to include Nighttime Øya in the festival pass. A valid Øya ticket for the day of the event (or a full festival pass) offers discounts at Nighttime Øya.

messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
